attributes.action: NHS needs funding. A&E waiting times outrageous!!! 7/8hours left in waiting room
attributes.background:
Went to A&E queens hospital, Romford on Thursday 5th January 2017. After being in a car accident hitting my head so hard, having head pain and neck pain also left shoulder. Feeling nauseous and dizzy. Registered at 10pm was seen at 5.30am
Elderly people left in corridors after having falls.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
